question: Which of the following was the last battle of World War II?
explanation: The Battle of Okinawa was the last major battle of World War II, and it one of the bloodiest battle fought. The Navyâ€™s Fifth Fleet and more than 180,000 U.S. Army and U.S. Marine Corps troops descended on the Pacific island of Okinawa for a final push towards Japan on April 1, 1945.
